trait.name: Far Sighted Artillery
entries: It is hard for the guardian to aim at creatures that are close to it. The guardian has disadvantage on attacks against creatures within 40 feet of it.

trait.name: Low Flying
entries: The guardian doesn't have the ability to hover more than 40 feet in the air.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The guardian deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Acid Spores
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 300/1200 ft., one target. Hit 35 ({@damage 5d12 + 3}) acid damage.
